attributes.action: allow all british children the right to fruits and veg
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many children in the UK go home to eat choclate bars,pop tarts etc and dinner usually consists of a microwaved meal with no fruit or veg in sight i belive that the goverment should send a week's amount of fruit and veg to each british household along with recipe cards to get children eating more healthily thus the obesity problem is reduced

rejection.details: Please provide your full name when submitting a petition.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
